translation.zh: 超级英雄 辨别不同
我们来扮演超级英雄吧！

translation.en: -[JJ] ♪ Mine is red! ♪ -♪ And mine is too! ♪
♪ Same or different We will help in many super ways! ♪
translation.zh: 外表相同或不同 都一样不平凡！

translation.en: [TomTom] Help! I can't find my baseball!
translation.zh: 帮帮我！我的棒球找不到了！

translation.en: ♪ Please help me find My favorite ball ♪
♪ It's small and white and round ♪
♪ I can't play my baseball game ♪
♪ Same or different We will help in many super ways! ♪
translation.zh: 外表相同或不同 都一样不平凡！

translation.en: [JJ] ♪ I found a ball That's round and green! ♪
[Bella] ♪ But TomTom's baseball's Round and white ♪
♪ Same or different We will help in many super ways! ♪
translation.zh: 外表相同或不同 都一样不平凡！

translation.en: [Bella] ♪ Here's a ball It's round and white ♪
♪ But this ball is way too big ♪
♪ Look up there, a bird? A plane? ♪
[JJ] ♪ That ball is small And round, and white ♪
♪ Now, I can play my game! ♪
[JJ and Bella] ♪ Superhero friends are here ♪
Help! Help! I can't find my doll!
translation.zh: 救我！救我！我找不到我的娃娃了！

translation.en: [both] ♪ Same or different We will help in many super ways! ♪
translation.zh: 外表相同或不同 都一样不平凡！

translation.en: ♪ Same or different We will help in many super ways! ♪
translation.zh: 外表相同或不同 都一样不平凡！

translation.en: [woman reading] "The Case of the Missing Shapes."
Can you find the missing shapes to open up the mystery box?
translation.zh: 你们需要找到上面的形状 才能打开这个神秘的盒子

translation.en: ♪ Look around, look around To find the shapes ♪
translation.zh: 仔细看 耐心找 把它找到

translation.en: [JJ] ♪ I'm looking for a shape That's round ♪
♪ I'm looking for a shape that's round ♪
♪ I'm a detective on the case ♪
translation.zh: 变身侦探 破解疑难

translation.en: ♪ Looking all around for the shapes ♪
♪ Looking for a shape like this ♪
[Ms. Appleberry] ♪ Do you know what shape it is? ♪
[all] ♪ We're looking for the shapes The missing shapes ♪
translation.zh: 大家一起来找缺的形状

translation.en: ♪ Look around. Look around to find the shapes ♪
translation.zh: 仔细看 耐心找 把它找到

translation.en: [Cece and Nina] ♪ We need a shape That has four sides ♪
translation.zh: 我们找的形状有四条边

translation.en: ♪ We need a shape that has four sides ♪
translation.zh: 我们找的形状有四条边

translation.en: ♪ We are detectives on the case ♪
translation.zh: 变身侦探 破解疑难

translation.en: ♪ Looking all around for the shapes ♪
[both] ♪ Looking for a shape like this ♪
[Ms. Appleberry] ♪ Do you know what shape it is? ♪
[Cece] A square! It has four sides.
translation.zh: 这是正方形！它有四条边

translation.en: [both] ♪ We're looking for the shapes The missing shapes! ♪
translation.zh: 大家一起来找缺的形状！

translation.en: ♪ Look around, look around To find the shapes ♪
translation.zh: 仔细看 耐心找 把它找到

translation.en: [Nico and Cody] ♪ We need a shape That has three sides ♪
translation.zh: 我们找的形状有三条边

translation.en: ♪ We need a shape that has three sides ♪
translation.zh: 我们找的形状有三条边

translation.en: ♪ We are detectives on the case ♪
translation.zh: 变身侦探 破解疑难

translation.en: ♪ Looking all around for the shapes ♪
♪ Looking for a shape like this ♪
♪ Do you know what shape it is? ♪
[Nico] A triangle! It has three sides.
translation.zh: 这是三角形！它有三条边

translation.en: [all] ♪ We're looking for the shapes The missing shapes! ♪
translation.zh: 大家一起来找缺的形状！

translation.en: ♪ Look around, look around To find the shapes ♪
translation.zh: 仔细看 耐心找 把它找到

translation.en: [JJ and Bella] ♪ Two sides are long And two sides are short ♪
translation.zh: 我们找的形状又长又方

translation.en: ♪ Two sides are long And two sides are short ♪
translation.zh: 它两条边短 两条边长

translation.en: ♪ We are detectives on the case ♪
translation.zh: 变身侦探 破解疑难

translation.en: ♪ Looking all around for the shapes ♪
[Bella] ♪ Looking for a shape like this ♪
[both] ♪ Do you know what shape it is? ♪
It has two long sides and two short sides.
translation.zh: 它有两条短边和两条长边

translation.en: [all] ♪ We found the key to the mystery ♪

translation.zh: 圆形、正方形、三角形和长方形！

translation.en: [all] ♪ Hooray Hooray for all the shapes! ♪
[JJ and Cody] ♪ We are digging up The fossil dinosaurs ♪
translation.zh: 我是一个恐龙考古学家

translation.en: ♪ And then we dig some more ♪
♪ We're digging up the fossil dinosaurs ♪
translation.zh: 我是一个恐龙考古学家

translation.en: [JJ] ♪ I think I found A fossil dinosaur ♪
translation.zh: 看 恐龙化石被我找到啦

translation.en: ♪ Blow off the sand Until there is no more ♪
translation.zh: 把它挖出来 再吹掉泥沙

translation.en: ♪ Its tail has spikes And its back has plates ♪
translation.zh: 它尾巴尖尖 骨板高耸

translation.en: [both] ♪ We're digging up The fossil dinosaurs ♪
translation.zh: 我是一个恐龙考古学家

translation.en: ♪ And then we dig some more ♪
♪ We're digging up the fossil dinosaurs ♪
translation.zh: 我是一个恐龙考古学家

translation.en: [Cody] ♪ We're tapping On a fossil dinosaur ♪
translation.zh: 我是一个恐龙考古学家

translation.en: [both] ♪ Its head Has three big horns on top ♪
[Cody and JJ] ♪ We're digging up The fossil dinosaurs ♪
translation.zh: 我是一个恐龙考古学家

translation.en: ♪ And then we dig some more ♪
♪ We're digging up the fossil dinosaurs ♪
translation.zh: 我是一个恐龙考古学家

translation.en: [both] ♪ We're brushing off The fossil dinosaurs ♪
translation.zh: 我是一个恐龙考古学家

translation.en: ♪ Brush, brush, brush, Then brush a little more ♪
translation.zh: 刷呀刷 看有什么变化

translation.en: [JJ] ♪ This one has a long neck That's for sure ♪
♪ We're digging up The fossil dinosaurs ♪
translation.zh: 我是一个恐龙考古学家

translation.en: ♪ And then we dig some more ♪
♪ We can fix the fossil dinosaur ♪
♪ Now it's not in pieces anymore ♪
♪ No plates or horns or a big long neck ♪
[both] ♪ But it has sharp teeth It's a T-Rex! ♪
translation.zh: 它牙齿锋利 是霸王龙！

translation.en: [Mom] ♪ A, B, C, D, E, F, G ♪
[Mom and Dad] ♪ H, I, J, K ♪
[Mom, Dad, YoYo and TomTom] ♪ Q, R, S ♪
[YoYo and TomTom] ♪ Won't you come and play with me? ♪
[JJ] ♪ Won't you come And play with me? ♪
♪ Won't you come and play with me ♪
Who wants to be chefs today and bake a special treat?
translation.zh: 今天想不想来当大厨 做一点美味的点心？
想 想 我们快开始吧！

translation.en: First, we need the ingredients. Can you find me seven potatoes?
translation.zh: 首先要准备好原料 你们能帮我拿来七个土豆吗？

translation.en: [Cody and Cece] ♪ One potato Two potatoes ♪
translation.zh: 一个土豆 两个土豆

translation.en: [Cody and Cece] ♪ Potatoes Seven potatoes, more ♪
translation.zh: 土豆 七个土豆 好啦

translation.en: Thanks. Now can you find me seven zucchinis?
translation.zh: 谢谢 现在还需要你们 去拿七个西葫芦

translation.en: [Cody and Cece] ♪ One zucchini Two zucchinis ♪
translation.zh: 一根西葫芦 两根西葫芦

translation.en: ♪ Five zucchinis, six zucchinis Seven zucchinis, more ♪
translation.zh: 五根西葫芦 六根西葫芦 七根西葫芦 好啦

translation.en: Great! Now let's mash up seven bananas.
translation.zh: 太棒了！现在还需要用到七根香蕉
一根香蕉 两根香蕉
五根香蕉 六根香蕉
接下来 还要放上七颗蓝莓

translation.en: [Cody and Cece] ♪ One blueberry Two blueberries ♪
translation.zh: 一颗蓝莓 两颗蓝莓

translation.en: [all] ♪ Five blueberries, six blueberries Seven blueberries, more ♪
translation.zh: 五颗蓝莓 六颗蓝莓 七颗蓝莓 好啦

translation.en: Okay, time to mix all of our ingredients together. Ready?
translation.zh: 好了 现在该把所有原料 混合在一起 准备？

translation.en: [all] ♪ We're mixing Seven, and now we pour! ♪
translation.zh: 搅拌七下 最后倒出！

translation.en: [both] ♪ One fresh slice Two fresh slices ♪
translation.zh: 一块出炉 两块出炉

translation.en: ♪ Five fresh slices, six fresh slices ♪
translation.zh: 五块出炉 六块出炉

translation.en: [Kwame] ♪ One for you, two for you ♪
translation.zh: 一块给你 两块给你

translation.en: ♪ Five for you, six for you ♪
translation.zh: 五块给你 六块给你

translation.en: ♪ Seven, but who are these for? ♪
translation.zh: 七块 小朋友们上桌

translation.en: ♪ And it's something I can't do ♪
♪ I feel sad and mad inside ♪
♪ And I don't know what to do ♪
[Mom] ♪ Something you can try Is noticing your senses ♪
translation.zh: 方法很简单 去运用你的感官

translation.en: [Mom] ♪ Let's notice something With our eyes ♪
I see a big leaf and Mommy's face!
translation.zh: 我看到一片大树叶 还有妈妈的脸！

translation.en: And a ladybug on your shoe!
translation.zh: 你的鞋子上有一只瓢虫！

translation.en: [JJ] ♪ When I'm feeling sad And mad inside ♪
[Mom] ♪ We can notice something With our ears ♪

translation.zh: 我听到了嘎吱嘎吱的秋千！
我听到了冰淇淋车的声音！

translation.en: [JJ and TomTom] ♪ When I'm feeling Sad and mad inside ♪
[Mom] ♪ We can notice something With our nose ♪

translation.zh: 我闻到了水果味的冰淇淋！

translation.en: [Mom] ♪ We can notice something With our tongue ♪
[JJ] ♪ When I'm feeling sad And mad inside ♪
[Mom] ♪ We can notice something We can touch ♪
[JJ] ♪ I am calm and ready When I focus on my senses ♪
translation.zh: 学会运用五感 我变得冷静又勇敢

translation.en: Let's take turns until we reach all the flags!
translation.zh: 大家轮流出发 要把所有的小旗都拿到手哦！

translation.en: [children] ♪ Up and down 'Til we reach the flags ♪
♪ Through and around 'Til we reach the flags ♪
♪ Under and over to reach the flags ♪
[Cody] ♪ It's your turn to get the flag ♪
[Cody] ♪ At the top so high Which way should I go? ♪
translation.zh: 小旗插高高 伸手够不到

translation.en: ♪ Up is the way to go ♪
[Cody] ♪ Now it's your turn To get the flag ♪
translation.zh: 我拿到了 现在轮到你！

translation.en: [Cece] ♪ At the bottom of the slide Which way should I go? ♪
translation.zh: 旗在滑梯最底下 怎么能到达？

translation.en: ♪ Down is the way to go ♪
[children] ♪ Up and down 'Til we reach the flags ♪
♪ Through and around Until we reach the flags ♪
♪ Under and over to reach the flags ♪
♪ It's your turn to get the flag ♪
[Bella] ♪ On the other side Which way should I go? ♪
translation.zh: 旗在另一边 我该怎么走？

translation.en: ♪ Around is the way to go ♪
♪ Now it's your turn to get the flag ♪
translation.zh: 我拿到了 现在轮到你

translation.en: [Nico] ♪ Just a bit too far Which way should I go? ♪
translation.zh: 旗插得好远 我该怎么走？

translation.en: ♪ Through is the way to go! ♪
[children] ♪ Up and down 'Til we reach the flags ♪
♪ Through and around 'Til we reach the flags ♪
♪ Under and over to reach the flags ♪
♪ It's your turn to get the flag ♪
[JJ] ♪ Just below the table Which way should I go? ♪
translation.zh: 这面旗在桌下 我该怎么走？

translation.en: ♪ Under is the way to go! ♪
♪ Now it's your turn to get the flag ♪
translation.zh: 我拿到了 现在轮到你！

translation.en: [Nina] ♪ There across the puddle Which way should I go? ♪
translation.zh: 这里有个水坑 我该怎么走？

translation.en: [children] ♪ Over is the way to go! ♪
[children] ♪ Up and down We got the flags ♪
♪ Through and around, we got the flags ♪
♪ Under and over, we got the flags ♪
♪ Taking turns getting all the flags! ♪
♪ Taking turns to get all the flags! ♪
♪ We can't go out and play ♪
[Grandparents] ♪ With some fabric And some thread ♪
[Grandparents] A quilt is made of patterns.
♪ It's the order something goes in ♪
It's time to choose your fabric.
translation.zh: 你们来选择喜欢的花色吧

translation.en: -[TomTom] ♪ I like the one with stars ♪ -[JJ] ♪ I like the one with the fish ♪
translation.zh: 我喜欢小星星 我喜欢小黄鱼

translation.en: [YoYo] ♪ I like the one with butterflies ♪
[all] ♪ Stars, then fish Then butterflies next! ♪
translation.zh: 星星、小鱼 然后是蝴蝶！

translation.en: ♪ It's the order something goes in ♪
♪ It's the order something goes in ♪
♪ With stars and fish and butterflies ♪
♪ A super cozy, warm and cuddly ♪
[woman reading] "Days of the Week Musical Chairs."
[Ms. Appleberry] ♪ I look at my calendar And what do I see? ♪
translation.zh: 大家跟我看日历 来一起学习

translation.en: ♪ Seven days in a row for me ♪
[Ms. Appleberry] ♪ Seven days in a week That's right! ♪
♪ Friday and Saturday come and then ♪
[Ms. Appleberry] ♪ These are the seven days of the week ♪
♪ It's so fun to learn The days of the week ♪
translation.zh: 我想要把它们牢记心间

translation.en: [children] ♪ These are the seven days of the week ♪
♪ I love the days of the week ♪
Let's learn the days of the week with a game of musical chairs.
translation.zh: 我们一边唱一边玩抢座位的游戏 复习学到的知识

translation.en: ♪ Friday and Saturday come and then ♪
♪ Friday and Saturday come and then ♪
♪ Friday and Saturday come and then ♪
♪ Friday and Saturday come and then ♪
♪ Friday and Saturday come and then ♪
♪ Friday and Saturday come and then ♪
[children] ♪ These are the seven days of the week ♪
♪ It's so fun to learn The days of the week ♪
translation.zh: 我想要把它们牢记心间

translation.en: [JJ] ♪ These are the seven days of the week ♪
[JJ and Nina] ♪ I love The days of the week ♪
♪ Friday and Saturday come and then ♪

translation.zh: 嘟嘟嘟嘟 嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟
嘟嘟嘟嘟 嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟

translation.en: ♪ One, two, three We have three rockets ♪
translation.zh: 一、二、三 有三枚火箭

translation.en: ♪ And each one of you will get to try ♪
[all] ♪ One, two, three We have three rockets ♪
translation.zh: 一、二、三 有三枚火箭

translation.en: [Grandparents] ♪ Three special rockets for you to fly ♪
[all] ♪ One, two, three Get our rockets ready ♪
translation.zh: 一、二、三 做好发射准备

translation.en: [TomTom] ♪ To fly like a rocket ship Up into space ♪
translation.zh: 像真的火箭飞向遥远太空

translation.en: ♪ One, two, three, my rocket is ready ♪
translation.zh: 一、二、三 火箭准备就绪

translation.en: [all] ♪ My rocket is ready to fly today! ♪
translation.zh: 很快就能让它发射升空！

translation.en: ♪ Zooming high, look at the rocket fly ♪

translation.zh: 嘟嘟嘟嘟 嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟
嘟嘟嘟嘟 嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟

translation.en: [children] ♪ One, two, three We each have rockets ♪
translation.zh: 一、二、三 每人一枚火箭

translation.en: ♪ Let's launch a rocket into the sky ♪
[YoYo] ♪ I am ready to launch my rocket ♪
♪ Let's do the countdown 'til it flies ♪
♪ Zooming high, look at the rocket fly ♪
♪ Zooming through the sky ♪ [children] ♪ I made the rocket fly! ♪
translation.zh: 飞到看不见 我发射了火箭！
嘟嘟嘟嘟 嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟
嘟嘟嘟嘟 嘟嘟嘟嘟嘟

translation.en: [children] ♪ One, two, three We each have rockets ♪
translation.zh: 一、二、三 每人一枚火箭

translation.en: ♪ Let's launch a rocket into the sky ♪
[JJ] ♪ I am ready to launch my rocket ♪
♪ Let's do the countdown 'til it flies ♪
♪ When I tried to fly my rocket ♪
♪ It didn't zoom up into the sky ♪
[children] ♪ Try again to fly your rocket ♪
translation.zh: 别灰心 再尝试一遍

translation.en: ♪ Let's count down again until it flies ♪
translation.zh: 坚持下去 梦想会实现

translation.en: ♪ Zooming high Look at the rocket fly ♪
[children] ♪ Blast off! Zooming through the sky ♪
[all] ♪ We all made the rockets fly! ♪
[JJ and Cody] ♪ It's such a snowy day ♪
♪ So let's all go out and play ♪
-We have to dress for the snow, Cody. -Yay!
translation.zh: -快穿上下雪天的衣服吧 Cody -耶！

translation.en: ♪ Third your boots and mittens last ♪
[all] ♪ This is the way We dress for snow ♪
translation.zh: 哦 下雪天我要穿得厚

translation.en: ♪ Dress for snow, dress for snow ♪
♪ This is the way we dress for snow ♪
[Kwame] ♪ First, you put your snowsuit on Snowsuit on, snowsuit on ♪
translation.zh: 先要穿好雪地装 防严寒 抗风霜

translation.en: ♪ First, I put my snowsuit on So we can play outside ♪
translation.zh: 我穿上了雪地装才能出去玩耍

translation.en: [Kwame] ♪ Second You put your snow hat on ♪
♪ Snow hat on, snow hat on ♪
[Cody] ♪ Second, I put my snow hat on ♪
[Kwame] ♪ Third You put your snow boots on ♪
♪ Snow boots on, snow boots on ♪
[Cody] ♪ Third, I put my snow boots on So we can play outside ♪
translation.zh: 我穿上了雪地靴才能出去玩耍

translation.en: [Kwame] ♪ Fourth, you put your mittens on Mittens on, mittens on ♪
translation.zh: 最后戴上厚手套 热乎乎 心欢畅

translation.en: [Cody] ♪ Fourth, I put my mittens on So we can play outside ♪
translation.zh: 最后戴上厚手套才能出去玩耍

translation.en: ♪ Now, we're ready to go out and play ♪
translation.zh: 装备齐全 玩耍多愉快

translation.en: [Cody] ♪ First, we put the snowsuit on Snowsuit on, snowsuit on ♪
translation.zh: 先要穿好雪地装 防严寒 抗风霜

translation.en: [JJ and Cody] ♪ First We put the snowsuit on ♪ ♪ So we can play outside ♪
translation.zh: 我穿上了雪地装才能出去玩耍

translation.en: [JJ] ♪ Second, we put the snow hat on Snow hat on, snow hat on ♪
translation.zh: 然后要戴上防风帽 戴头上 暖洋洋

translation.en: [JJ and Dad] ♪ Second We put the snow hat on ♪ ♪ So we can play outside ♪
translation.zh: 我要再戴上防风帽才能出去玩耍

translation.en: [JJ and Cody] ♪ Third We put the snow boots on ♪ ♪ Snow boots on, snow boots on ♪
translation.zh: 接着穿上雪地靴 保护脚 不冻僵

translation.en: ♪ Third, we put the snow boots on So we can play outside ♪
translation.zh: 我穿上了雪地靴 放心出去玩耍

translation.en: [JJ and Cody] ♪ Fourth We put the mittens on ♪ ♪ Mittens on, mittens on ♪
translation.zh: 最后戴上厚手套 热乎乎 心欢畅

translation.en: [all] ♪ Fourth, we put the mittens on So we can play outside ♪
translation.zh: 最后戴上厚手套才能出去玩耍

translation.en: ♪ Third, the boots and mittens last ♪
♪ That's the way we dress for snow ♪
[Ms. Appleberry] ♪ Today we are floating Around the world ♪
translation.zh: 我们今天就要扬帆远航

translation.en: ♪ Let's say hello everywhere that we go ♪
translation.zh: 说声你好 走遍天涯海角

translation.en: [all] ♪ Today we are floating Around the world ♪
translation.zh: 我们今天就要扬帆远航

translation.en: [Cece and Nina] ♪ All around the world we go ♪
[Ms. Appleberry] ♪ We are landing in France today ♪
[JJ] ♪ See the Eiffel Tower ♪ ♪ Hear accordions play ♪
translation.zh: 看埃菲尔铁塔 手风琴来伴奏

translation.en: [Ms. Appleberry] ♪ We say "bonjour" in French ♪ ♪ And "hello" in English ♪
translation.zh: 说声Bonjour 这是用法语说你好
Bonjour 你好 Bonjour 你好！

translation.en: [children] ♪ All around the world we go ♪
[Ms. Appleberry] ♪ We're off to Brazil That's where we'll go ♪
translation.zh: 热情的巴西 美丽国度

translation.en: [children] ♪ We'll dance the samba And play the surdo ♪
translation.zh: 一起跳桑巴 开心打手鼓
说声Ola 这是用葡萄牙语
Ola 你好 Ola 你好！

translation.en: ♪ All around the world we go ♪
[Ms. Appleberry] ♪ We're landing in India That's where we are ♪
translation.zh: 旅途来到印度 继续前进

translation.en: [children] ♪ We'll see Bengal tigers And play the sitar ♪
translation.zh: 参观孟加拉虎 弹奏西塔琴

translation.en: [Ms. Appleberry] ♪ We say "namaste" in Hindi ♪ ♪ And "hello" in English ♪
translation.zh: 说声Namaste 这是用印地语说你好
Namaste 你好 Namaste 你好！

translation.en: [children] ♪ All around the world we go ♪
[Ms. Appleberry] ♪ We are landing in Kenya at last ♪
[Ms. Appleberry] ♪ We say "jambo" in Swahili ♪ ♪ And "hello" in English ♪
translation.zh: 说声Jambo 这是斯瓦希里语的你好
Jambo 你好 Jambo 你好！

translation.en: [children] ♪ All around the world we go ♪
♪ We'll fly in our rocket ship ♪
[children] ♪ All eight planets Travel in orbit ♪
♪ We'll get to know them, every one ♪
[Mom and Dad] ♪ Solar system Solar system ♪
♪ The very first one that we see ♪
♪ It's really hot with lots of craters ♪
♪ Just as dry as it can be ♪
♪ Having lots of clouds and gases ♪
translation.zh: 覆盖大气 云雾弥漫

translation.en: ♪ Make it hot and bare and dry ♪
[children] ♪ Earth is the third It is our home ♪
♪ Plus a moon that's very near ♪
[YoYo] ♪ Mars is fourth It's the red planet ♪
♪ With rocks and craters And big windstorms ♪
translation.zh: 风暴漫天 尘埃滚滚

translation.en: [all] ♪ All eight planets Travel in orbit ♪
♪ We'll get to know them, every one ♪
♪ See each one as it passes ♪
[TomTom and YoYo] ♪ Saturn is the next big planet ♪
♪ The one with all the pretty rings ♪
[TomTom] ♪ They're made up Of ice and dust ♪
♪ Mostly made of ice and gas ♪
[Dad] ♪ It's really cold And spinning sideways ♪
translation.zh: 它上面很冷 倾斜旋转

translation.en: ♪ Hit by something in the past ♪
[TomTom and YoYo] ♪ Neptune is the final planet ♪
♪ Its color is a pretty blue ♪
♪ Having lots of wind and cyclones Makes it very cold, it's true! ♪
translation.zh: 狂风肆虐 风力强劲 表面温度也很低

translation.en: [children] ♪ All eight planets Travel in orbit ♪
♪ We'll get to know them, every one ♪
[Ms. Appleberry] Ready to do the Hokey Pokey, everybody?
translation.zh: 我们大家一起来跟我做韵律操吧

translation.en: [all] ♪ You put your one foot in You put your one foot out ♪
translation.zh: 你向前迈一步 再向后点点脚

translation.en: ♪ You put your one foot in And you shake it all about ♪
translation.zh: 你向前迈一步 抬在空中摇一摇

translation.en: ♪ You do the Hokey Pokey And you turn yourself around ♪
translation.zh: 跟节奏摆一摆手 再原地转一个圈

translation.en: [Ms. Appleberry] ♪ You put your other foot in ♪ ♪ You put your other foot out ♪
translation.zh: 另一只脚迈一步 另一只脚点点脚

translation.en: ♪ You put your other foot in And you shake it all about ♪
translation.zh: 你伸出另一只脚 抬在空中摇一摇

translation.en: [all] ♪ You do the Hokey Pokey And you turn yourself around ♪
translation.zh: 跟节奏摆一摆手 再原地转一个圈

translation.en: [Ms. Appleberry] ♪ You put your one hand in ♪ ♪ You put your one hand out ♪
translation.zh: 伸出手摸一摸 再向后挠一挠

translation.en: ♪ You put your one hand in And you shake it all about ♪
translation.zh: 伸出手摸一摸 大家一起摇一摇

translation.en: [all] ♪ You do the Hokey Pokey And you turn yourself around ♪
translation.zh: 跟节奏摆一摆手 再原地转一个圈

translation.en: [all] ♪ You put your other hand in You put your other hand out ♪
translation.zh: 另一只手摸一摸 另一只手挠一挠

translation.en: ♪ You put your other hand in And you shake it all about ♪
translation.zh: 你伸出另一只手 大家一起摇一摇

translation.en: ♪ You do the Hokey Pokey And you turn yourself around ♪
translation.zh: 跟节奏摆一摆手 再原地转一个圈

translation.en: [Ms. Appleberry] ♪ You put your head in You put your head out ♪
translation.zh: 头向前探一探 再向后摇一摇

translation.en: ♪ You put your head in And you shake it all about ♪
translation.zh: 头向前探一探 大家一起摇一摇

translation.en: [all] ♪ You do the Hokey Pokey And you turn yourself around ♪
translation.zh: 跟节奏摆一摆手 再原地转一个圈

translation.en: [all] ♪ You put your whole self in You put your whole self out ♪
translation.zh: 全身都向前送 全身都向后跳

translation.en: ♪ You put your whole self in And you shake it all about ♪
translation.zh: 全身都向前送 大家一起摇一摇

translation.en: ♪ You do the Hokey Pokey And you turn yourself around ♪
translation.zh: 跟节奏摆一摆手 再原地转一个圈

translation.en: And that's what it's all about!
translation.zh: 这套韵律操都学会了吗？

translation.en: [gasps] Want to have lunch in town instead?
translation.zh: 不如我们去外面吃午饭吧？

translation.en: We can name all the sounds as we go.
translation.zh: 顺便听听路上会遇到哪些声音

translation.en: [Mom] ♪ And on our way, we hear a… ♪
♪ With a tweet tweet here And a tweet tweet there ♪
translation.zh: 这叽叽喳喳 那叽叽喳喳

translation.en: ♪ Here a tweet, there a tweet A baby bird! Tweet, tweet! ♪
translation.zh: 我听到叽喳叫 是只鸟宝宝！

translation.en: [JJ] ♪ And on our way we hear a… ♪
♪ With a ring ring here And a ring ring there ♪
translation.zh: 这里叮铃铃 那里叮铃铃

translation.en: ♪ Here a ring, there a ring It's a bell! Ring! Ring! ♪
translation.zh: 我听到叮铃铃 是自行车响！

translation.en: ♪ And on our way we hear a… ♪
♪ With a honk honk here And a honk honk there ♪
translation.zh: 这里嘟嘟响 那里嘟嘟响

translation.en: ♪ Here a honk, there a honk It's a bus! Honk honk! ♪
translation.zh: 我听到嘟嘟响 是汽车喇叭！

translation.en: ♪ And on our way we hear a… ♪
[Mom] ♪ With a meow meow here And a meow meow there ♪
translation.zh: 这里喵喵叫 那里喵喵叫

translation.en: ♪ Here a meow, there a meow It's a cat! Meow, meow! ♪
translation.zh: 我听到喵喵叫 是小猫在求救！

translation.en: ♪ And on our way we heard a… ♪
[JJ] ♪ With a chime chime here And a chime chime there ♪
translation.zh: 这里叮叮当 那里叮叮当

translation.en: ♪ Here a chime, there a chime Everywhere a chime chime ♪
translation.zh: 我听到叮叮当 是门上的铃铛

translation.en: [both] ♪ Me and Mommy went to town ♪
[Cece and Bella] ♪ Red and yellow And violet and green ♪
♪ Sing a rainbow, sing a rainbow too ♪
translation.zh: 歌唱彩虹 会歌唱彩虹
我们去把彩虹找回来吧

translation.en: [both] ♪ Red and yellow And violet and green ♪
[Cece and Bella] ♪ Red and yellow And violet and green ♪
♪ Now we can sing a rainbow ♪

translation.zh: 看啊！我们也变成了彩虹

translation.en: [JJ] ♪ I like to eat, eat, eat Apples and bananas ♪
translation.zh: 我喜欢吃美味的苹果和香蕉

translation.en: [JJ and YoYo] ♪ I like to eat, eat, eat Apples and bananas ♪
translation.zh: 我喜欢吃美味的苹果和香蕉

translation.en: [JJ] ♪ I like to eat, eat, eat Apples and bananas ♪
translation.zh: 我喜欢吃美味的苹果和香蕉

translation.en: [all] ♪ We like to eat, eat, eat Apples and bananas ♪
translation.zh: 我们喜欢吃美味的苹果和香蕉

♪ I like to eat, eat, eat Ay-ples and ba-nay-nays ♪
translation.zh: 我喜欢吃美味的苹果和香蕉

translation.zh: 我喜欢吃美味的苹果和香蕉

translation.zh: 我们喜欢吃美味的苹果和香蕉

translation.zh: 我们喜欢吃美味的苹果和香蕉

translation.zh: 我喜欢吃美味的苹果和香蕉

translation.zh: 我喜欢吃美味的苹果和香蕉

大家注意 赶快过来集合

translation.en: ♪ Gather around For the Animal Name game ♪
translation.zh: 来认识小动物们的名字

translation.en: [all] ♪ "B" like a bumblebee Buzzing like a bumblebee ♪
translation.zh: 大黄蜂 Bumblebee 嗡嗡嗡嗡 飞得忙

translation.en: [Ms. Appleberry] ♪ Bumblebee starts with "B" ♪ [all] ♪ Alligator starts with "A" ♪
translation.zh: Bumblebee B开头 Alligator A开头

translation.en: [all] ♪ "J" like a jellyfish Jiggle like a jellyfish ♪
translation.zh: 水母是Jellyfish 摇摇摆摆水里游

translation.en: [both] ♪ Our names start With the letter "N" ♪
[Nina] ♪ Narwhals like to take a nap ♪
♪ And that's how you play The Animal Name game! ♪
translation.zh: 这就是这些小动物的名字！

translation.en: Okay, kids. We need fruits that are red, blue and yellow.
translation.zh: 好了 孩子们 你们需要找到 红色、蓝色和黄色的水果哦

translation.en: [all] ♪ Find the red and blue And yellow fruits ♪
♪ What do we see at the grocery? ♪
♪ Red, red! Which one is red? ♪
♪ Red, red. Which one is red? ♪
[all] ♪ Find the red and blue And yellow fruits ♪
♪ What do we see at the grocery? ♪
♪ Look over there At all the round and colorful fruits ♪
translation.zh: 快看这里 五颜六色的水果

translation.en: ♪ Blue, blue! Which one is blue? ♪
[Kwame and Cody] ♪ I found a blue fruit! ♪
♪ Blue, blue. Which one is blue? ♪
[Cody and JJ] ♪ Honk, honk! Blue, blue! ♪
♪ Find the red and blue And yellow fruits ♪
♪ What do we see at the grocery? ♪
[both] ♪ Yellow, yellow Reach for the yellow ♪
translation.zh: 黄色 黄色 去找到黄色

translation.en: ♪ I see yellow and so do you ♪
[all] ♪ We found the red And blue and yellow fruits ♪
translation.zh: 我们买到三种颜色水果

translation.en: ♪ And brought them home to eat ♪
Okay, class. Our bus will be here at twelve o'clock.
translation.zh: 好了 同学们 我们的车子12点就要到了

translation.en: [Ms. Appleberry] ♪ One, two, three o'clock Four o'clock, rock ♪
translation.zh: 一、二、三、四点 时钟摇摆

translation.en: [all] ♪ Five, six, seven o'clock Eight o'clock, rock ♪
translation.zh: 五、六、七、八点 时钟摇摆

translation.en: ♪ Nine, ten, eleven o'clock Twelve o'clock, rock ♪
translation.zh: 九、十、十一、十二 时钟摇摆

translation.en: ♪ We're gonna rock around The clock 'til night ♪
translation.zh: 跟着时钟摇摆 夜深人在

translation.en: [Ms. Appleberry] ♪ Put your glad rags on And join me, hon ♪
translation.zh: 穿好看衣裳 尽情歌唱

translation.en: ♪ We'll have some fun When the clock strikes one ♪
translation.zh: 时钟到一点 游戏开场

translation.en: [all] ♪ We're gonna rock around The clock 'til night ♪
translation.zh: 跟着时钟摇摆 夜深人在

translation.en: ♪ We're gonna rock, rock, rock In broad daylight ♪
translation.zh: 跟着时钟摇摆 通宵达旦

translation.en: ♪ We're gonna rock, gonna rock Around the clock 'til night ♪
translation.zh: 尽情摇摆 去摇摆 快乐永不败

translation.en: ♪ If the band slows down We'll yell for more ♪
translation.zh: 演出要停下 我们更喧哗

translation.en: [Ms. Appleberry] ♪ We're gonna rock around The clock 'til night ♪
translation.zh: 跟着时钟摇摆 夜深人在

translation.en: [all] ♪ We're gonna rock, rock, rock In broad daylight ♪
translation.zh: 跟着时钟摇摆 通宵达旦

translation.en: ♪ We're gonna rock, gonna rock Around the clock 'til night ♪
translation.zh: 尽情摇摆 去摇摆 快乐永不败

translation.en: ♪ When the chimes ring five Six and seven ♪
♪ We'll be right in seventh heaven ♪
♪ We're gonna rock around The clock 'til night ♪
translation.zh: 跟着时钟摇摆 夜深人在

translation.en: ♪ We're gonna rock, rock Rock in broad daylight ♪
translation.zh: 跟着时钟摇摆 通宵达旦

translation.en: ♪ We're gonna rock, gonna rock Around the clock 'til night ♪
translation.zh: 尽情摇摆 去摇摆 快乐永不败

translation.en: ♪ When it's eight, nine, ten, eleven too ♪
[Ms. Appleberry] ♪ I'll be going strong and so will you ♪
translation.zh: 我更加欢畅 你也一样

translation.en: [all] ♪ We're gonna rock around The clock 'til night ♪
translation.zh: 跟着时钟摇摆 夜深人在

translation.en: ♪ We're gonna rock, rock, rock In broad daylight ♪
translation.zh: 跟着时钟摇摆 通宵达旦

translation.zh: 尽情摇摆 去摇摆 快乐永不败

translation.en: [JJ] ♪ When the clock strikes twelve We'll cool off then ♪
translation.zh: 到了十二点 休息片刻

translation.en: [Ms. Appleberry] ♪ Start a-rocking Around the clock again ♪
[all] ♪ We're gonna rock around The clock 'til night ♪
translation.zh: 跟着时钟摇摆 夜深人在
